testDescription: Should return an empty list of posts from jsonplaceholder
Should ignore bad query string and return full list of posts from jsonplaceholder
Should generate an error for a missing item due to a bad expectedResponse to showcase error generation
Should generate an error for a difference in values for an item within the collection of results due to a bad expectedResponse to showcase error generation
Should generate an error for a difference in values for a single item due to a bad expectedResponse to showcase error generation
Should generate an error with a mix of missing item and difference in values to showcase error generation
